description: [Latrodectus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1160) can use rundll32.exe to execute downloaded DLLs.(Citation: Elastic Latrodectus May 2024)(Citation: Bleeping Computer Latrodectus April 2024)

external_references.description: Abrams, L. (2024, April 30). New Latrodectus malware attacks use Microsoft, Cloudflare themes. Retrieved September 13, 2024.
Stepanic, D. and Bousseaden, S. (2024, May 15). Spring Cleaning with LATRODECTUS: A Potential Replacement for ICEDID. Retrieved September 13, 2024.
